name: VITEB - Web Design & Development Company
tag_list: web-design, web-development, offshore-outsourcing, internet-marketing, hire-web-designer, graphics-designing, offshore-software-development, search-engine-marketing, seo, sem, ppc-advertisement
overview:
VITEB is a leading Offshore IT Outsourcing Company that offers high-quality and cost-effective web, mobile and software solutions to the clients across the world. VITEB is a part of group of companies being managed by ethical management team with result-driven professionals adhering to client’s requirements and fulfilling it in the best and most economical way.

VITEB is a one stop solution provider for all your IT needs no matter the size and type of the business. We have good experience and expertise across various industries verticals. We have 8 years of experience and successfully completed thousands of projects which earned us hundreds of highly satisfied clients across the world.

We are team of 100+ professionals that includes designers, developers and marketers. They possess up-to-date knowledge and hands on experience with various technologies which can help them to solve most complex problems.

We have good track record in delivering creative, unique and user-friendly solutions on time and budget.

Our services:

  • Web Design
  • Website Development
  • Web Application Development
  • Enterprise Solutions
  • Mobile Apps Development for iPhone, Android, BlackBerry, Windows Mobile, etc.
  • Tablet Application Development
  • eCommerce Solutions
  • Content Management Systems
  • Open Source Customization, Integration & Development
  • Internet Marketing Services and more…

For more information, visit www.viteb.com

    -
